Asking <S%G154><s%> A Favour <S%G5485><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> He Would Send For <S%G3343><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> An Ambush <S%G1747><s%> Forming <S%G4160><s%> To Put To Death <S%G337><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> On <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> The Way. <S%G3598><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Festus <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> Therefore <S%G5347><s%> Answered, <S%G611><s%> Should Be Kept <S%G5083><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> Caesarea, <S%G2542><s%> <S%G1438><s%> And Himself <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3195><s%> Was About <S%G1722><s%> Shortly <S%G5034><s%> To Set Out. <S%G1607><s%>

Those <S%G3588><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> In Power <S%G1415><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> Says He, <S%G5346><s%> Having Gone Down Too, <S%G4782><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G435><s%> This, <S%G5129><s%> Let Them Accuse <S%G2723><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1304><s%> And Having Spent <S%G1161><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> More <S%G4119><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> Ten, <S%G1176><s%> Having Gone Down <S%G2597><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Caesarea, <S%G2542><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Morrow <S%G1887><s%> Having Sat <S%G2523><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment Seat <S%G968><s%> He Commanded <S%G2753><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> To Be Brought. <S%G71><s%>

Being Come <S%G3854><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> He, <S%G846><s%> Stood Round <S%G4026><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> Who Had Come Down <S%G2597><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Weighty <S%G926><s%> Charges <S%G157><s%> Bringing <S%G5342><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Were <S%G3756><s%> Not Able <S%G2480><s%> To Prove : <S%G584><s%>

Said In Defence <S%G626><s%> , <S%G846><s%> He, <S%G3754><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> Caesar <S%G2541><s%> In Anything <S%G5100><s%> Sinned I. <S%G264><s%>

But <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5347><s%> Festus, <S%G1161><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Wishing <S%G2309><s%> Favour <S%G5485><s%> To Acquire For Himself <S%G2698><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Art Thou Willing <S%G2309><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> Having Gone Up <S%G305><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> These Things <S%G5130><s%> To Be Judged <S%G2919><s%> ' Before <S%G1909><s%> Me? <S%G1700><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> But Said <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Before <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment Seat <S%G968><s%> Of Caesar <S%G2541><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> I Am, <S%G1510><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> It <S%G3165><s%> Behooves Me <S%G1163><s%> To Be Judged. <S%G2919><s%> To Jews <S%G2453><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> I Did Wrong, <S%G91><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Very Well <S%G2566><s%> Knowest. <S%G1921><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> I Do Wrong <S%G91><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Worthy <S%G514><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> Have Done <S%G4238><s%> Anything, <S%G5100><s%> I 3756 PRT-N Do Not Deprecate 3868 V-PNI-1S 3588 T-ASN To Die; 599 V-2AAN If 1487 COND But 1161 CONJ Nothing 3762 A-NSN There Is 2076 V-PXI-3S Of Which 3739 R-GPN They 3778 D-NPM Accuse 2723 V-PAI-3P Me, 3450 P-1GS No One 3762 A-NSM Me 3165 P-1AS Can 1410 V-PNI-3S To Them 846 P-DPM Give Up. 5483 V-ADN To Caesar 2541 N-ASM I Appeal. 1941 V-PMI-1S

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Festus, <S%G5347><s%> Having Conferred <S%G4814><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Council, <S%G4824><s%> Answered, <S%G611><s%> To Caesar <S%G2541><s%> Thou Hast Appealed, <S%G1941><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> Caesar <S%G2541><s%> Thou Shalt Go. <S%G4198><s%>

<S%G2250><s%> And Days <S%G1161><s%> Having Passed <S%G1230><s%> Certain, <S%G5100><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bernice <S%G959><s%> Came Down <S%G2658><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Caesarea, <S%G2542><s%> Saluting <S%G782><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Festus. <S%G5347><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> Many <S%G4119><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> They Stayed <S%G1304><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Festus <S%G5347><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Laid Before <S%G394><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Relating To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> There Is <S%G2076><s%> Left <S%G2641><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Felix <S%G5344><s%> A Prisoner, <S%G1198><s%>

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Whom, <S%G3739><s%> Being <S%G1096><s%> On My <S%G3450><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> Made A Representation <S%G1718><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Asking <S%G154><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Judgment : <S%G1349><s%>

To <S%G4314><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G611><s%> I Answered, <S%G3754><s%> It <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> A Custom <S%G1485><s%> With Romans <S%G4514><s%> To Give Up <S%G5483><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> , Destruction, <S%G684><s%> <S%G4250><s%> Before <S%G2228><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2723><s%> Being Accused <S%G2596><s%> Face To Face <S%G4383><s%> May Have <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Accusers, <S%G2725><s%> <S%G5117><s%> And Opportunity <S%G5037><s%> Of Defence <S%G627><s%> He May Get <S%G2983><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Accusation. <S%G1462><s%>

Having Come Together <S%G4905><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Here, <S%G1759><s%> Delay <S%G311><s%> None <S%G3367><s%> Having Made, <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Next Day <S%G1836><s%> Having Sat <S%G2523><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment Seat <S%G968><s%> I Commanded <S%G2753><s%> To Be Brought <S%G71><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man; <S%G435><s%>

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Standing Up <S%G2476><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Accusers <S%G2725><s%> No <S%G3762><s%> Charge <S%G156><s%> Brought <S%G2018><s%> Of Which <S%G3739><s%> Supposed <S%G5282><s%> I; <S%G1473><s%>

<S%G2213><s%> But Questions <S%G1161><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Their <S%G3588><s%> Own <S%G2398><s%> System Of Religion Lit. Demon Worship <S%G1175><s%> They Had <S%G2192><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Who Is Dead, <S%G2348><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Affirmed <S%G5335><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> To Be Alive. <S%G2198><s%>

<S%G639><s%> And Being Perplexed <S%G1161><s%> I 1473 P-1NS As To 1519 PREP The 3588 T-ASF Concerning 4012 PREP This 5127 D-GSM Inquiry 2214 N-ASF Said, 3004 V-IAI-1S Would 1487 COND He Be Willing 1014 V-PNO-3S To Go 4198 V-PNN To 1519 PREP Jerusalem, 2419 N-PRI And There 2546 ADV-C To Be Judged 2919 V-PPN Concerning 4012 PREP These Things. 5130 D-GPN

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Having Appealed For <S%G1941><s%> To Be Kept <S%G5083><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Augustus <S%G4575><s%> Cognizance, <S%G1233><s%> I Commanded <S%G2753><s%> To Be Kept <S%G5083><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Till <S%G3739><s%> I Might Send <S%G3992><s%> Gun <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Caesar. <S%G2541><s%>

On The <S%G3588><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Morrow <S%G1887><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bernice, <S%G959><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> Pomp, <S%G5325><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hall Of Audience, <S%G201><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Captains <S%G5506><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> <S%G3588><s%> ' Of <S%G2596><s%> Eminence <S%G1851><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Commanded <S%G2753><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Festus <S%G5347><s%> Was Brought <S%G71><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul. <S%G3972><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G5346><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Festus, <S%G5347><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%> King <S%G935><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Being Present With <S%G4840><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Men, <S%G435><s%> <S%G2334><s%> <S%G2334><s%> This One <S%G5126><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Pleaded <S%G1793><s%> With Me <S%G3427><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Here, <S%G1759><s%> <S%G1916><s%> Crying Out That <S%G3361><s%> Ought <S%G1163><s%> To Live <S%G2198><s%> He <S%G846><s%> No Longer. <S%G3371><s%>

But <S%G1473><s%> I 1161 CONJ Having Perceived 2638 V-2AMP-NSM Nothing 3367 A-ASN Worthy 514 A-ASN Of Death 2288 N-GSM He 846 P-ASM Had Done, 4238 V-RAN Also 2532 CONJ Himself 846 P-GSM And 1161 CONJ This One 5127 D-GSM Having Appealed To 1941 V-AMP-GSM 3588 T-ASM Augustus 4575 A-ASM I Determined 2919 V-AAI-1S To Send 3992 V-PAN Him. 846 P-ASM

Irrational <S%G249><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> It Seems <S%G1380><s%> Sending <S%G3992><s%> A Prisoner, <S%G1198><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Charges <S%G156><s%> To Signify. <S%G4591><s%>
